body:
hi all,

  I have to used external elasticsearch (5 node)  for storage data in back end.
I enable https with searchguard plug in and try to run with below command

```
docker run -e SPAN_STORAGE_TYPE=elasticsearch  jaegertracing/jaeger-collector --log-level=debug --es.server-urls https://ip:9200 --es.username=jaeger --es.password=jaeger --es.tls.ca= /etc/ssl/certs/cacert.pem
```

and i got error 

```
{"level":"fatal","ts":1549876373.3432007,"caller":"collector/main.go:103","msg":"Failed to init storage factory","error":"failed to create primary Elasticsearch client: health check timeout: Head https://ip:9200: Tunnel Forbidden: no Elasticsearch node available","errorVerbose":"no Elasticsearch node available
```

so i test run with command 
```
docker run -e SPAN_STORAGE_TYPE=elasticsearch  jaegertracing/jaeger-collector --log-level=debug --es.server-urls https://ip:9200 
```

and got same error too
could jeager team help me how to pass the parameter for https to connecto es( for solve this issue)

elasticsearch = v6.4.0
searchguard= search-guard-6-6.4.0-23.0
title: Support TLS with username and password
